text: DLO can refer to: * D'Lo Brown, ring name of American wrestler Ace Conner * D'Lo, Sri Lankan-American writer *Dead letter office, part of a postal office *Defence Logistics Organisation of the UK military * IATA location identifier for Delano Municipal Airport, California, US *Dense linear order, in mathematical order theory * Direct labour organisation of a UK local authority * Discontinuity layout optimization, an engineering analysis procedure * Nickname of D'Angelo Russell, an American basketball player
title: DLO
